医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
臭氧对慢性肾损伤患者有效在一项为期 24 周的试验中，索马鲁肽使慢性肾病和肥胖患者的蛋白尿减少了 52%，并改善了肾脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ozempic- effective-for-病人-with-chronic-kidney-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ozempic- effective-for-病人-with-chronic-kidney-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=551fabad-9328-4396-9d73-4f638e753c80 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:15:00 -0400 Ozempic effective for patients with chronic kidney damage
新研究探讨抗菌药物暴露如何影响帕金森病风险接触抗生素显示出对帕金森病的潜在保护作用，而抗真菌药物的使用则与风险增加有关，表明微生物组的参与。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-explores-how-antimicrobial-exposure-affects-Parkinsone28099s-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-research-explores-how-antimicrobial-exposure-affects-Parkinsone28099s-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa2acd8f-3138-4f9f-8d36-f2a3f285fa97 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 06:13:00 -0400 New research explores how antimicrobial exposure affects Parkinson’s disease risk
蘑菇蛋白棒可以提高记忆力吗？研究表明黑鸡蚁对认知有益根据最近的研究，FCM 蛋白质零食棒富含氨基酸和抗氧化剂，可在短短六周内改善大脑功能和记忆准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Can-a-mushroom- Protein-bar-improve-memory-Study-suggests-cognitive-benefits-of-Termitomyces-fuliginosus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Can-a-mushroom- Protein-bar-improve-memory-Study-suggests-cognitive-benefits-of-Termitomyces-fuliginosus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=300de3f6-a8d2-4e25-aa7c-66251e4bb7ea Mon, 28 Oct 2024 05:40:00 -0400 Can a mushroom protein bar improve memory? Study suggests cognitive benefits of Termitomyces fuliginosus
扩大减肥药物的获取范围可以挽救数千人的生命研究人员探索了扩大新型减肥药物的使用范围以提高超重和肥胖人群的生存率的潜在好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Expanded-access-to-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Expanded-access-to-weight-loss-drugs-could-save-thousands-of-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=371c9fa2-683b-4f75-8641-eb14e22c27d1 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 04:40:00 -0400 Expanded access to weight-loss drugs could save thousands of lives
碎牛肉与大豆肉：哪个更能增强肌肉力量？研究人员比较了植物性肉类替代品和碎牛肉在刺激肌肉蛋白质合成方面的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ground-beef-vs-soy-based-meat-Which-packs-more-muscle-building-power.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Ground-beef-vs-soy-based-meat-Which-packs-more-muscle-building-power.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c3fc809-787d-4488-b4cf-6f224011561e Mon, 28 Oct 2024 04:19:00 -0400 Ground beef vs. soy-based meat: Which packs more muscle-building power?
科学家发现导致阿尔茨海默病的“超级传播者”原纤维阿尔茨海默氏症等痴呆症的治疗仍然是现代医学面临的最大挑战之一。在神经退行性疾病过程中，某些蛋白质（例如β淀粉样蛋白）会在大脑中积聚。它们被怀疑与疾病的发展有关，这就是为什么它们被认为是治疗方法的有希望的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Scientists-uncover-superspreader-fibrils-driven-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Scientists-uncover-superspreader-fibrils-driven-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f84a52-5bb0-4884-a0d4-9f28e72fdaf6 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 03:57:34 -0400 Scientists uncover "superspreader" fibrils driving Alzheimer's Disease
新模型揭示了多基因疾病的遗传根源科学家使用的许多统计模型和算法都可以想象为“黑匣子”。这些模型是提供准确预测的强大工具，但它们的内部工作原理不容易解释或理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-model-sheds-light-on-the-genic-roots-of-polygenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/New-model-sheds-light-on-the-genic-roots-of-polygenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13e1c239-a723-4e01-8c3c-3c0961540356 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 03:41:26 -0400 New model sheds light on the genetic roots of polygenic diseases
揭开亚瑟综合症的秘密这些错误很小，但会带来严重的后果：在亚瑟综合症中，基因突变会导致听力和视力丧失。美因茨大学的细胞生物学家 Uwe Wolfrum 教授正在研究这种罕见遗传性疾病的分子背景 - 得到基金会的支持，尤其是受影响个体本身的支持https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-Usher-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-Usher-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bade988d-55b7-47eb-83e0-0107369b48d8 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 03:35:01 -0400 Unlocking the secrets of Usher syndrome
Yourgene Health 推进囊性纤维化检测，符合 IVDR 要求Yourgene Health（Novacyt 公司集团的一部分）是一家领先的国际分子诊断集团，宣布其 Yourgene® 囊性纤维化基础检测已获得欧盟体外诊断法规 (IVDR) 新要求的认证。 Yourgene 囊性纤维化基础检测是 IVDR 下的 C 类体外医疗设备，供医疗保健专业人员在分子实验室环境中使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Yourgene-Health-advances-cystic-太多纤维化-testing-with-IVDR-compliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241028/Yourgene-Health-advances-cystic-fibrosis-testing-with-IVDR-compliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed0283f5-4b2d-4be0-863f-eb81ab3477d9 Mon, 28 Oct 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Yourgene Health advances cystic fibrosis testing with IVDR compliance
数字平台在塑造人类好奇心方面的作用在某一时刻，您可能已经上网寻找特定的信息，并发现自己“掉进了维基兔子洞”，因为您发现了全新的、更令人着迷的相关主题——一些琐碎，一些相关——；你可能已经陷入困境，很难拼凑出是什么让你陷入困境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/The-role-of-digital-platforms-in-shaping- human-curiosity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241027/The-role-of-digital-platforms-in-shaping- human-curiosity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6246cf7-dec7-43fa-8318-1c8847c5bb16 Sun, 27 Oct 2024 23:58:14 -0400 The role of digital platforms in shaping human curiosity
